author: phucthai
content: I have another question regarding the shadow fork. Do we use a different network ID to prevent sending blocks of the shadow fork to other nodes? Or do we just let the nodes reject those blocks after verification?

author: parithosh
content: depends what you want to do, we keep the same ID because we want to stay peered to the canonical network. That way we still get txs via gossip. The main chain will just reject everything because its produced by invalid validators on the canonical chain.
